overview: Malia is a very bad girl. In and out of woman's prisons for most of her life, she now finds herself back behind bars at an all girl correctional college. A hellish place with long, dark hallways and cold steel bars where everyone is fair game for her endless and outrageous sexual behavior. Getting naked and nasty with the top of the school's faculty and seducing her way through the unsuspecting student body, the moans and screams of her prey echo through the dark halls of the school dormitory as she burns a path of sexual devastation that leaves no doubt in anyone's mind the reason why she is behind bars, and what bizarre encounters still lie ahead...
tagline: The story of a fatal distraction.
title: Kiss Me Deadly
